name: KLUH
description:
Play as Kluh and smash enemies for as long as you can!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement.
  • Control - Toggle sprint.
  • Passive - Kluh stores all damage received as rage. Rage starts decaying after 4 seconds of not receiving damage. All damage Kluh deals is amplified by up to 2x, proportional to the current amount of rage stored.
  • Left Click - Kluh punches.
  • Right Click - Kluh picks up an enemy. The ability can be reactivated to throw the enemy. The thrown enemy, and any other enemy collided with, are damaged and stunned. If no enemy is nearby, Kluh picks up a rock instead.
  • Left Shift - Kluh leaps into the air and smashes the ground, stunning and dealing damage to all enemies near the point of impact.
  • R - Kluh roars, stunning all nearby enemies. The current amount of stored rage is consumed and Kluh heals for 50% of it.
